TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler(object sender, DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs)
public delegate void DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時插入按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項插入資料錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查插入作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入委派給事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventHandlerInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventHandlerInline/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventhandlerinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventHandlerInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventHandlerInline/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventhandlerinlinevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將委派給事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler/CS/detailsviewinsertedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewInsertedEventHandler/VB/detailsviewinsertedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
